name: Forked Lightning
text:
Cost: 2 AP, 3 mana.
Make a 5d6 (high-rolling) elemental attack against a character within range. If the attack succeeds, you may repeat it against another character.
Each time you repeat the attack, it suffers a -1 die penalty. You may not repeat the attack against a character you've already damaged with the attack.

Increase the size of your mana pool by 1.
